pages.text: $(bgreen)Split Pea$() has two heads -- or really, one head with a large head-like growth on the back -- pays off big in my line of work.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)125$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Huge Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)one pea forward and two backwards$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy.
